item.title: Jessica add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Mark Haddon
item.description: "...people who believe in God think God has put human beings on earth because they think human beings are the best animal, but human beings are just an animal and they will evolve into another animal, and that animal will be cleverer and it will put human beings into a zoo, like we put chimpanzees and gorillas into a zoo. Or human beings will all catch a disease and die out or they will make too much pollution and kill themselves, and then there will only be insects in the world and they will be the best animal." -- Mark Haddon

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived. I did not wish to live what was not life, living is so dear; nor did I wish to practise resignation, unless it was quite necessary. I wanted to live deep and suck out all the marrow of life, to live so sturdily and Spartan-like as to put to rout all that was not life, to cut a broad swath and shave close, to drive life into a corner, and reduce it to its lowest terms." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Jessica add a quote by M.T.
item.description: "I think resentment is when you take the poison and wait for the other person to die" -- M.T.

item.title: Jessica add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Maurice Setter
item.description: "Too many people miss the silver lining because theyâ€™re expecting gold." -- Maurice Setter

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Everyone is ignorant, only on different subjects." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Stop worrying about the world ending today. It's already tomorrow in Australia." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Bacon
item.description: "Parents who wish to train up their children in the way they should go must go in the way in which they would have their children go." -- Bacon

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Vince Lombardi
item.description: "The man on top of the mountain didn't fall there." -- Vince Lombardi

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "If I had to choose a religion, the sun as the universal giver of life would be my god." -- Napoleon Bonaparte

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Ursula K. Le Guin
item.description: "It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end." -- Ursula K. Le Guin

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Raymond Charles Barker
item.description: "Your life becomes the thing you have decided it shall be." -- Raymond Charles Barker

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Diane Ackerman
item.description: "I don't want to get to the end of my life and find that I have just lived the length of it. I want to have lived the width of it as well." -- Diane Ackerman

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Dag Hammarskjold
item.description: "Life only demands from you the strength you possess." -- Dag Hammarskjold

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "Parties who want milk should not seat themselves on a stool in the middle of the field in hope that the cow will back up to them." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Jon Bon Jovi
item.description: "Map out your future, but do it in pencil." -- Jon Bon Jovi

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Flavia Weedn
item.description: "If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again." -- Flavia Weedn

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Grandma Moses
item.description: "And life is what we make it. Always has been, always will be." -- Grandma Moses

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Morris West
item.description: "If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine." -- Morris West

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Jessica add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "I said "Somebody should do something about that." Then I realized I am somebody." -- Lily Tomlin
